help.name: help
help.helptext:
Usage: Help [Command]
Displays help prompt for any command. For a list of all commands, type Help List.

list.name: list
list.helptext:
The commands available are:
help
come in
list
discordpost
open repo
close repo
build repo
update repo
stealth build
stealth update
modline
show

come in.name: come in
come in.helptext:
Usage: come in
The come in command lets the user test if Sawyer is active by forcing him to echo a response.

thanks.name: thanks
thanks.helptext:
Usage: thanks
Sawyer tells the user that they are bae.

discordpost.name: discordpost
discordpost.helptext:
Usage: discordpost [channel] [messagecontent]
Sawyer passes the message in messagecontent to Captain Bannon who then posts it to Discord channel [channel]. All messagecontent passed is lower case.

open repo.name: open repo
open repo.helptext:
Usage: open repo
Sawyer will force the repository server to enable the webserver, allowing access to the repositories.

close repo.name: close repo
close repo.helptext:
Usage: close repo
Sawyer will disable the webserver on the repository server, closing all access to the repositories.

build repo.name: build repo
build repo.helptext:
Usage: build repo
Sawyer will delete and then rebuild all repositories, and make a post in Discord.

update repo.name: update repo
update repo.helptext:
Usage: update repo
Sawyer will check all repositories, make any updates, and make a post in Discord.

stealth build.name: stealth build
stealth build.helptext:
Usage: stealth build
Sawyer will delete and then rebuild all repositories, without posting to Discord.

stealth update.name: stealth update
stealth update.helptext:
Usage: stealth update
Sawyer will check all repositories and make any updates without posting to Discord.

modline.name: modline
modline.helptext:
Usage: modline [add/remove] [@mod] [repo]
Sawyer will add or remove a mod from a given repo.
Warning: Sawyer will return errors if the mod has not been uploaded to the repo server, or the repo doesn't exist.
This command does not perform an update, only adds/removes mods from the current repository configuration.

show.name: show
show.helptext:
Usage: show [repo]
Sawyer will print a list of all the mods currently in a given repository.
